self

Create dict of dicts that contains lists with lists of lists to execute with subprocess {'project': { 'concurrent': [[["make", "def_config"], ["make"]], [["fusesoc", "run", "--build", "--target", "zed_blinky", "::blinky:1.0.0"]]], 'sequential': [[]]}}

def _execute(
self
)

Call subprocess as a thread and add it to a list of threads for wait to check on.  iterate over projects avaiable and execute commands per project
